casebody.data:
Sean WEST and Amy West, as Parents and Natural Guardians of Juliana West, a Minor, Individually and in Their Own Right; and New York Private Trust Company, Petitioners
v.
ABINGTON MEMORIAL HOSPITAL d/b/a/ Abington Hospital-Jefferson Health; Regina P. Sturgis-Lewis, M.S.N.; and Joel I. Polin, M.D., Respondents No. 465 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 13, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 13th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
